item.title: A little about me
item.description: My name is Avishai Ish-Shalom, AKA @nukemberg on Twitter. I'm a software/systems engineer and manager, working mainly in Operations and backend development. Currently I'm an Engineer in Residence at Aleph VC. Prior to that I led a backend team at Wix.com and in a previous life the co-founder & CTO of Fewbytes - a well-known consulting firm in Israel - where I've spent 6 years helping companies deal with scale, reliability and various other challenges.
